scripts.build:all: ng build pro-connection-services && ng build pro-dimm-slider && ng build pro-slider && ng build pro-select-component
scripts.publish:pro-connection-services: cd projects/pro-connection-services && npm version patch && cd ../.. && ng build pro-connection-services && cd dist/pro-connection-services && npm publish && cd ../..
scripts.publish:pro-dimm-slider: cd projects/pro-dimm-slider && npm version patch && cd ../.. && ng build pro-dimm-slider && cd dist/pro-dimm-slider && npm publish && cd ../..
scripts.publish:pro-select-component: cd projects/pro-select-component && npm version patch && cd ../.. && ng build pro-select-component && cd dist/pro-select-component && npm publish && cd ../..
scripts.publish:pro-slider: cd projects/pro-slider && npm version patch && cd ../.. && ng build pro-slider && cd dist/pro-slider && npm publish && cd ../..
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:pro-connection-services && npm run publish:pro-select-component && npm run publish:pro-dimm-slider && npm run publish:pro-slider
